_sText:
Hi friends! I present to you another work of my alterations. The other day I decided to remake the map dm_lostarena under CS:Source. Clients on my server have appreciated it at its true worth.

And so, what's new?

— Added waypoint CT and T.
— Removed unnecessary parts of the map.
— Added zone purchase of weapons.
— Added zone plant the bomb. 



P. S.

Apologize for what has not managed to create a radar map to create't have time. But with time will do it. - Navigation mesh for bots handled personally by me and built into the map itself. Problems with bots? 

No, not heard...

— Of all the modes that we have at the moment, I would advise to use this map in different modes: Death Match or Gun Games. That's all, enjoy the game.
